Description:
Greetings warrior! After 2 minutes you will be automatically teleported to the epic boss!
Schedule:
Monday - Orfen Tuesday - Core Wednesday and Sunday - Ant Queen Thursday - Antharas Friday - Valakas Saturday - Baium
Reward:
The faction, which will kill the Epic Boss get 350 Aden and 1 part broken Epic Jewelry (depending on Boss), you can convert NPC Demort jewelry characteristics! The losing side will receive a consolation bonus in the form of 350 Aden.
